about.description:
Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on
a local network -- this means that you can plug your laptop or
computer into a network and instantly be able to view other people who
you can chat with, find printers to print to or find files being
shared. This kind of technology is already found in MacOS X (branded
'Rendezvous', 'Bonjour' and sometimes 'ZeroConf') and is very
convenient.

This package contains utility modules to talk to Avahi with Python easier.

name: python-avahi
raw_recipe:

    url: http://avahi.org/download/avahi-0.7.tar.gz

    script: python-avahi.sh
    string: py37hfcebeac_1

        - perl-xml-parser 2.44_01 pl526hb1d6bea_1002
        - pkg-config 0.29.2 hb849cc2_1007
        - tapi 1000.10.8 h879752b_4
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0

        - dbus 1.13.6 h2f22bb5_0

        - expat 2.2.9 hb1e8313_2

        - glib 2.66.1 h39b9ebd_0
        - gobject-introspection 1.66.1 py37h9b7d8a4_1
        - icu 67.1 hb1e8313_0
        - libcxx 10.0.1 h5f48129_0
        - libdaemon 0.14 h0b31af3_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb1e8313_1007
        - libiconv 1.16 haf1e3a3_0
        - libpng 1.6.37 hb0a8c7a_2
        - libxml2 2.9.10 h2c6e4a5_2
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_2
        - openssl 1.1.1h haf1e3a3_0
        - pcre 8.44 h4a8c4bd_0
        - pixman 0.38.0 h01d97ff_1003
        - pycairo 1.20.0 py37ha7df449_1
        - pygobject 3.38.0 py37hc2a344a_1
        - python 3.7.8 hc9dea61_1_cpython
        - python_abi 3.7 1_cp37m
        - readline 8.0 h0678c8f_2
        - sqlite 3.33.0 h960bd1c_1
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_1
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1009
    run:
        - dbus >=1.13.6,<2.0a0
        - dbus-python >=0.34

about:
    description: 'Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on

        a local network -- this means that you can plug your laptop or

        computer into a network and instantly be able to view other people who

        you can chat with, find printers to print to or find files being

        shared. This kind of technology is already found in MacOS X (branded

        ''Rendezvous'', ''Bonjour'' and sometimes ''ZeroConf'') and is very

        convenient.


        This package contains utility modules to talk to Avahi with Python easier.'
    dev_url: https://github.com/lathiat/avahi
    doc_url: http://avahi.org/doxygen/html/
    home: http://avahi.org
    license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
    license_family: LGPL
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: Python utility package for Avahi
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
